product_name: Outdoor Research Vanguard Bib Snow Pants - Men's
long_description: Designed for the skier who wants solid protection from wind, deep snow and wet storms, these pants have waterproof Gore-Tex soft-shell fabric, a zip-off bib, and a slew of backcountry features.
short_description: Designed for the skier who wants solid protection from wind, deep snow and wet storms, these pants have waterproof Gore-Tex soft-shell fabric, a zip-off bib, and a slew of backcountry features.
